title: FNT
name: Fiber Network Type
definition: Identifies the type of network to which the fiber based service is being assigned.
fieldNotes: The Fiber Network Identification data will be assigned by the provider.
validEntries: A  = Synchronous Optical Network (SONET)  B  = Dense Wave Division Multiplexing (DWDM)   C  = Optical Transport Network (OTN)
validEntryNotes: A valid entry of "N" is used when an FNI has not previously been assigned.
usageNotes: Required when the FNI field is populated, otherwise prohibited.
